text: Jhon Alejandro Perlaza Zapata (born 26 August 1994) is a Colombian sprinter. He competed in the men's 4 × 400 metres relay at the 2016 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Colombian male sprinters Category:Olympic athletes of Colombia Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Cali Category:South American Games bronze medalists for Colombia Category:South American Games medalists in athletics Category:Competitors at the 2014 South American Games Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2019 Pan American Games Category:Pan American Games competitors for Colombia Category:Pan American Games gold medalists for Colombia Category:Pan American Games medalists in athletics (track and field)
title: Jhon Perlaza
